channel.title: Need for good documentation for stackstorm with slack
channel.description: I am trying out integration of stackstorm with slack .can I get perfect documentation.i am Trying out everything available on internet but unfortunately not working . I am new to these integration.i should successfully get it out.

item.title: Need for good documentation for stackstorm with slack
item.dc:creator: amanda11
item.description:
If you configure st2chatops to use slack then it should be pretty straightforward - please check out this page What is ChatOps? â€” StackStorm 3.4.0 documentation

If you follow this page, and have any specific problems please provide details of exact problem so we can help.
